website_summaries.verdict: The Asus ROG Swift PG278Q is a 27-inch WQHD monitor designed for gamers. It uses Nvidia's G-Sync technology and a 144Hz refresh rate to deliver super-smooth motion performance, and it offers some neat gaming features.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. Initially I was looking to get an ultrawide ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this from Amazon warehouse and my initial impression is WOW. This thing is great. Initially I was looking to get an ultrawide monitor but now that I see the size of this I'm glad i didn't. The build quality is great. Everything feels solid and the bezel is tiny. Controls for the menus etc are good however I would personally say the power button is a little close to the menu ones as I've turned it off while I've been tinkering. The resolution and refresh rates are great too. Games look so much better than before. I'm suprised at the difference it's made. Very happy so far and will write back if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: ... stating defective panels (bleeding/fading/dead pixels) but this monitor was perfect when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Was slightly worried at some reviews stating defective panels (bleeding/fading/dead pixels) but this monitor was perfect when it arrived, and 1 month later - no difference. No degredation, no problems, ulmb/gsync/od works perfectly. Comes with stand pre-fitted so you just take it out the box and plug it in. (Not tested 3d-vision). Great monitor, not had other monitors of this calibre but this is fine for me, can definitely tell the difference from my syncmaster t220 xD. Reccommend+
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wade

customer_reviews.title: GREAT  GREAT PRODUCT! LOVE IT! LOVE IT! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT GREAT PRODUCT LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT had this product for a good while now..... its easy to set up with easy instructions I got a longer port lead to place the monitor further away from the PC love the size love the picture quality love the screen would love to have another two or three of these just found them a little price eeee however you pay for Quality and this monitor is Quality if you can afford this then I would. and would still today say this is outstanding in its field
customer_reviews.author: paul wilson

customer_reviews.title: Paid so much but this monitor is PROBLEMATIC
customer_reviews.text: Some of these monitor has blurry and flickering screen issues. After many hours of debugging I figured out it is a hardware problem. The ASUS support was horrible, I moved from UK a few months after the purchase and basically they told me "We will charge you a ton of money to diagnose and if it is faulty you will have to pay for the repair". There were more (but not as important) problems on top of all these. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Pavlos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Fully tested the monitor no problems i can see this was a upgrade from 1920x1080 60hz monitor i am just tweaking and playing around with it think will upload some profiles off TFT central hurts my eye's my older monitor was better on my eyes i just need to find the right settings very happy with it great monitor fast and smooth gaming experience huge boost also used with my new GTX 1070 AMP Extreme love the lighting ring on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jayc

customer_reviews.title: Turns on and off instantly!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about receiving a defective product but no such issues. The screen came and works great. One thing that is really refreshing is how quickly it turns on and off. It's basically instant! The picture is clear and nice and bright. If I have any complaints, its just that the 5 way button isn't that easy to use and I keep struggling to navigate menus as quickly as I'd like with it.
customer_reviews.author: tkbluh

customer_reviews.title: ... for gaming then look no further this is truly amazing, but where it falls short is in its ...
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a monitor just for gaming then look no further this is truly amazing, but where it falls short is in its very aggressive AG coating. If your gaming this isn't an issue but any time you have a white background the coating becomes very obvious and distracts from how good the panel is, for this reason I returned the product and I use my PC for more than just gaming. Such a shame because if it wasn't for this, the monitor is flawless!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Niblett

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant but slightly scratched on arrival :(.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing monitor. I upgraded from a 22.5" 1080p display and this is 100% better. The colours on the screen are amazing to say it's a TN panel. I would rate it very close to an IPS panel. I'm using it with a 980ti and the 1440p resolution and being able to have frame rates up to 144fps it completely transform games. It's a whole new experience. The only reason it's getting 3 stars is mine arrived with a scratched base. I'm too impatient to send it back for a replacement though especially after waiting so long to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ward

customer_reviews.title: What a beauty!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Monitor arrived yesterday as promised by Amazon! I was pleasantly surprised to find out that the monitor was made in august 2015 hopefully whatever issues there were have been ironed out! It arrived with a uk plug, USB 3.0 cable and a DP cable. Pretty easy to set up and so far no issues to report! Always a pleasure dealing with amazon uk!
customer_reviews.author: A. JIBOYE

customer_reviews.title: 50% Good and 50% Bad...
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, picture, stand, and build is very good. I bought two though - and one failed within 3 weeks and I had to get it replaced (ie no quibbles replacement from Amazon - great service!). I don't expect bad quality control on a premium product, so was disappointed with the failed one, and replaced it with a different manufacturers product. The other (working) screen is going strong though, and my wife would not swap it for anything, as she is an avid WoW player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good monitor for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor for gaming. Good picture quality, frame rate and resolution. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: van Jurco

customer_reviews.title: Still one of the best monitors today
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Still one of the best gaming monitors as of 2016 (As IPS version suffers from back light bleed) High refresh rate Easy to set up and use. Cons: Expensive Can suffer from bugs: Every now and then screen will turn bury and will have to restart PC to fix
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent monitor even if it is a bit on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent monitor even if it is a bit on the pricey side mine was shipped from UK after the first which was shipped from Spain disappeared in transit and still only had 2 pin plug. Would be 5 stars but having issues with it freezing if I try to open more than 1 window at a time. Fixed the above problem by reinstalling the drivers. This uses a display port cable to connect to your pic if your graphics card doesn't have this port you may want to upgrade it
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor.
customer_reviews.text: It was with quite a bit of trepidation that I bought this monitor, it cost twice as much as the TV I have in my lounge! I'd saved up to build a gaming PC and after reading about G-Sync decided to bite the bullet, pay the early adopter premium and try and future proof myself. It's a great screen, feels quality and I don't regret the purchase at all. I've not noticed the G-Sync at all (but maybe that's the point).
customer_reviews.author: Rosco McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Superb monitor, had it for around 6 months now ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb monitor, had it for around 6 months now & not had any issues with it. first experience of G-Sync was with the bundled game "Doom", wow is all i can say :-)
customer_reviews.author: Paul Restall

customer_reviews.title: which was annoying. Changing it out for a british one wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a european plug, which was annoying. Changing it out for a british one wasn't an issue though. As for the monitor itself, it's wonderful. asus did good with this. really good. g-sync is fantastic, 144hz overclock is marvellous, and I'm saving for a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal quality panel
customer_reviews.text: This panel has impressed from the moment I got it out of the box with a premium build quality that requires no assembly. Plugged it has amazing colour reproduction; best TN quality I have seen. No flicker or back light bleed and gsync is a treat on the eyes. My only caveat is the viewing angle is rather narrow compared to other monitors I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Still the best 1440p gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return 1 because of a panel defect. Got a perfect one 2nd time around.
customer_reviews.author: Fence

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor. I haven't experienced the visual issues some ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. I haven't experienced the visual issues some have noted if watching it at certain angles. It works like a dream and my gaming performance in online first person shooters has improved massively - probably in part down to the fact that the monitor isn't struggling to keep up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Fan

customer_reviews.title: PIXEL LOSS
customer_reviews.text: l like this monitor "BUT" there are some faulty ones around this one I have has Pixel LOSS I'm NOW LOOKING TO HAVE THIS RETURNED asap
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert

customer_reviews.title: The Best Monitor I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The Best Monitor I've ever owned, great for gaming, only downside is using it as a TV the viewing angles aren't great if you are not at eye level to monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment - I did not think 144Hz ...
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment - I did not think 144Hz rate is worth it, but it is definitely worth the investment. The build of the item itself is great and though it is a small detail - I really like the fact that the power button is not visible and is instead hidden away from sight so as to not bother you.
customer_reviews.author: Kery

customer_reviews.title: excellent monitor but sadly no longer in stock
customer_reviews.text: excellent monitor but sadly no longer in stock. Even though it's a TNS, the viewing angles and colors are great
customer_reviews.author: Technoviking

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for me.
customer_reviews.text: I came from LG W2363D 120hz 1080p monitör. I did not see too much difference between 120 Hz-144hz. But g-sync is awesome. No tearing, no stutter and screen quality is very good. No backlight bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: Korhan Sukuroglu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best TN Panel on the market, expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing.
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues with dead pixels or bleeding. Excellent monitor for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Joao Paulo Novais Pessoa de Almeida

customer_reviews.title: I just love it
customer_reviews.text: It a screen, I love it, every one said I was mad. But I wanted it, it does the job I have no complaints it also make me smile every time I sit at my desk and look at it
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, great quality + perfect for FPS gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, not the best for watching videos as 144hz sometimes causes stutter (even when not on 144hz mode?) but otherwise perfect for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good, the best that I have had. It doesn't look cheap and the 144hz works flawless
customer_reviews.author: Frankin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor. No complaints. Fast, responsive,no tearing withG-Sync, awesome stands, thin bezzel, 1440p(which is not to be underestimated) and more. Worth everry penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic monitor. The image is so crisp and sharp. No shadow artefacts at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lucage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent gaming monitor which I really like
customer_reviews.author: david hughes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor. Only downside being it came with a faulty DP cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Monitor, if you are thinking of 1440p gaming then this is as good as your going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Davies

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, no issue's other than has mentioned before this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, no issue's other than has mentioned before this one came from italy so had euro style plug. Had to buy another one but not a major hassel, still a lot cheaper than else where.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: BEAST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have the cash this monitor is a beast, that is all.
customer_reviews.author: jason fallon

customer_reviews.title: Awsome screen yet expensive for the quality you get
customer_reviews.text: If I was to rate Looks and Performance alone I'd rate 5, but since I had couple issues with the screen I have to rate it at 3, for such expensive item, one would imagine to get a panel with no bleed or clouds, or at least a low level of it, but mine at least had a level of those not acceptable for this kind of items. If you can ignore that it might have a bit of bleed/cloud then I'd say this might be the best choice but be ready as it seems this screen as a bit of those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Then, so could many things. Coupled with 2XGTX970s this thing has changed my gaming world. G-sync is amazeballs! The standout games so far are the Metro, Redux duo. Just beautiful and as smooth as silk. I never bother to check frame rates, I never notice drops and blips. The only problem now is that all of my games are so much more enjoyable, I don't know which to play! As with all TN screens there is some degradation of picture quality when viewing from an angle but as I play close to the screen, it hasn't bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: David Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, going faulty again
customer_reviews.text: A good monitor that is clear and crisp and bright. This however is my second unit after the first one got some very tiny piece of debris behind the glass. And updating this review in 2018, the monitor has started to randomly flicker, changing the refresh rates etc. doesn't make any difference, I think it's on its way out. The monitor was very expensive and hasn't performed well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: otherwise it was easy to set up and a joy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how thick the box was that it came in (280mm), otherwise it was easy to set up and a joy to use. I am use max res, 60Hz refresh rate while playing Elite Dangerous and the screen has really brought the game to life compared with my previous 32" HD TV.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived very quickly, nicely packaged, absolutely beautiful monitor! Perfect for gaming. I was struggling between picking an ultra wide curved monitor, or this, I think I made the right choice, couldn't be happier! If you're on the fence, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: backlight bleed fault
customer_reviews.text: i got backlight bleed after warranty expired which seems to be a common fault with these monitors (tried credit card fix like others suggested but it did not work for me).guess iam stuck for now .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor product. The screen bleed on this is terrible ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product. The screen bleed on this is terrible and as a result i have had no choice but to return it to Amazon for a full refund, shame really its it looked like it should have been an absolute stunner of a monitor.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vassallo

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a monitor
customer_reviews.text: This screen is nothing but amazing. 144 FPS 3D vision at 2560 x 1440 (First monitor to go 3D Vision beyond 1080p) - Say no more. While it's not 4k, it is 144 FPS and that makes a huge difference on online FPS games. The color is good for a large TN panel GSync is awesome too, when you are running games at the higher res, it smooths it all out and dips in FPS below the 144. That said, I would like to see this monitor in Freesync side by side to compare the dfference as you are paying a premium for GSync. GSync is well worth the money IMO but obviously free would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Slack

customer_reviews.title: Non-british plug
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is fine but why does it not come with a British plug? Two stars, as unusable without an adapter, and for using such an incompetent delivery service (Yodel - absolutely useless).
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Their after sales service is poor.
customer_reviews.text: Screen faulty within six months! ASUS simply say it is not covered by the warranty because, in their opinion, it could be the result of consumer damage. A small area of the screen has formed a dark spot. DO NOT BUY THIS OR ANY OTHER ASUS PRODUCT! This is the second asus product that I have purchased in which the screen has failed within 6 months. Their after sales service is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Apiarist1958

customer_reviews.title: The colour was great, and everything works like its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: The colour was great, and everything works like its supposed to, however upon loading into windows the screen flickers with horizontal artifacts, somtimes with went away after a few mins but the last straw was 20 or so min after booting up when opening a program it still flickered. It almost seems like the blacklight flickers in some games also and for £540 i just wasnt having any of it so went for a refund. 2 stars for colour and such but thats it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good specs on paper but too flawed to keep.
customer_reviews.text: I found the TN panel on this display to be quite sub-par, the price point is too high for the panels quality. G-Sync and the 144Hz refresh rate are amazing though, my advice, wait for the IPS version.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Just s*** im so angry!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just s*** im so angry!!!! I was pay 600 pounds and after 6 monts not working I cant switch on grrr contact asus after again again again I just don't have time and energy do this s***
customer_reviews.author: Zsolt Csiki

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product and I will avoid Asus products generally ...
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this product and I will avoid Asus products generally in future. The power supply died after 7 months and so called Asus customer support (will likely be a small department judging by the lack of 'support' they do), won't change the PSU because I bought the monitor from a company in Italy through Amazon UK. They are slippery characters to deal with, left me with a lost temper. They seem to forget the PSU still has their branding on it, is their responsibility no matter where bought, dodgy, very dodgy indeed. Do yourself a favour, buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: smodge

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, revolutionary.
customer_reviews.text: The screen is AMAZING!!!!! Truly amazing for first person shooters, at 144 Hz, I cannot go back to 60 Hz ever. Super fast respond time! Only thing is that the manufacturers power cable is faulty, when your screen goes to sleep it just doesn't wake up, you have to unplug it and plug it back in. Didn't want the hassle of sending the whole screen back just to get a new plug for it so I bought a 3rd party replacement power plug and now it works fine. Does give off a bit of heat, even at 50% brightness, very power hungry screen. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The monitor itself for both work and gaming is amazing the level of detail and the fluidity of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived earlier than originally expected. The monitor itself for both work and gaming is amazing the level of detail and the fluidity of the display is truly a seminal experience, a word of warning however you need serious graphics horsepower to enjoy this monitor to its fullest expect to need a high level sli set up (ie gtx 970 sli) or something like the new TitanX to really be able to utilise this as more mundane graphics cards solutions are not going to push over 120 frames at this resolution without pretty much everything being on low (or they might not at all).
customer_reviews.author: James Adams

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is amazing. Was a bit worried about going back to ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived from EU so had to put a UK lead on it. Monitor is amazing. Was a bit worried about going back to TN, but the quality of this monitor really is stunning and games look great.
customer_reviews.author: InkZ

customer_reviews.title: Steep price for some but It was worth the money ...
customer_reviews.text: Steep price for some but It was worth the money for me. 0 dead pixels.
customer_reviews.author: Eoin

customer_reviews.title: One my best ever purchases
customer_reviews.text: One my best ever purchases. Not only is it 1440p and has gsync but you change the refresh rate on the fly between 120, 144 and plain old 60hz. Not complaints about any aspect of this product - spectacular...
customer_reviews.author: struthyfizz

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. Delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. Delivered quickly. Unfortunately it arrived with an EU style plug which is not mentioned in the ad so im knocking off a star.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: There are 4 dead pixel's for my second ROG Swift.
customer_reviews.author: Nusret

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice monitor.. only problem is that monitor is getting hot...for my taste too much
customer_reviews.author: Teo Majstrovic

customer_reviews.title: Too much backlight, grainy screen. Stand is great.
customer_reviews.text: It is too bright, I've changed backlight, and other settings several times. But I still don't think this monitor is good enough. Screen is grainy. The thing that I loved the most was the stand. It is very nice. But the screen itself hurts my eyes. And image quality ain't that great. The white is not actually white. It is "grainy". You can see things, but for the price it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Learner

customer_reviews.title: Instantly noticed my gameplay was getting better, headshots in CS
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a 27" 1080p @60Hz monitor and it was a night and day difference. Instantly noticed my gameplay was getting better, headshots in CS:GO were more frequent. Highly recommend this monitor if you have the video card to push it at 120/144hz.
customer_reviews.author: Donnerschlag
